body_html: Hi, thanks for the PR, but do you have the numbers that support it. IIRC I have decided not to multithread, exactly because of the memory controller. When the GEMM is close to being a GEMV, the computation is memory constrained, and multithreading does not help much. Can you please run some benchmarks and point out the cases when this actually improves performance?

body: Hi, thanks for the PR, but do you have the numbers that support it. IIRC I have decided not to multithread, exactly because of the memory controller. When the GEMM is close to being a GEMV, the computation is memory constrained, and multithreading does not help much. Can you please run some benchmarks and point out the cases when this actually improves performance?
